comments.comment: Hi, sorry for my slow response, I a bit busy right now. I will get to this during this week. Hope you are not in hurry.
I can't reproduce the issue. Could you give me more details? What version of numpy do you have?

Hi, am sorry to for my delayed response, I have numpy 1.12.1 tensorflow 1.4.0 opencv 3.1.0 pandas 0.21.0 matplotlib 2.1.0 and this issue raises for every other neural network. like for gap clasifier, char classifier and word classifier.

I still can't reproduce the error. It looks like images or gaplines aren't loaded properly which cause the NoneType object error. Try downloading and running the project from scratch. It the error persists, reopen this issue.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/Nayan-kumar-Chawda>@Nayan-kumar-Chawda</denchmark-link> were you able to solve this error?
This issue is duplicate. Refer to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Breta01/handwriting-ocr/issues/36>#36</denchmark-link>
